product_name: Bolle Diablo Rose Gun Sunglasses - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: These stylish, wraparound frames have grilled venting and coated polycarbonate lenses to fight fogging and promote clarity. Wear them on hikes and rides where dirt and sweat come with the terrain.
